about_the_game:
Experience the power of The United States military!

7 new scenarios available in Story, Skirmish and Battlegroup modes, plus a bonus Special Story mission.

Over 30 new US, Commonwealth and German units all available across Skirmish and Battlegroup modes:

US:

M4A1, M4A3, M4A3 (76), M4 Rhino, M4A3 (105), M5 Stuart, M5 Rhino, M10 Rhino, M8 Scott, M8 Greyhound, Jeeps with 30 cal and 50 cal MGs, M16 "Meatchopper", M18 Hellcat, M3 halftrack (30 cal and 50 cal), 3 Inch AT gun, Regular and replacement infantry, Airborne, Armored infantry, Rangers, Combat Engineers

Existing units also available for US forces as well as Brit/Commonwealth:

M10 TD, M4A1 (76), 57mm AT gun (6 pdr)

German:

StuG IV, Somua (f), Renault R35 (f), Hotchkiss H39 (f), Panzer II Luchs, Marder III, 37mm Pak (Fallsch), Fallschirmjager

British/Commonwealth:

Sherman Rhino, Stuart Rhino, Cromwell Rhino

All factions:

Artillery observer
